Description: Large boulders appear above a target creature in range, crashing down on top of them. The target must make a STR save against your Move DC, taking rock damage and falling prone on a failed save, and half as much without falling prone on a success.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
